name: MedicationReconciliationEncounterHCPCSCodesMSSPACO
title: Medication Reconciliation Encounter HCPCS Codes MSSP ACO
description: The value set represents the encounters for MSSP ACO  ACO 12 CARE-1 Medication Reconciliation Post-Discharge.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Medication reconciliation after an inpatient discharge.),(Data Element Scope: Encounters where medication reconciliation should occur after an inpatient discharge.),(Inclusion Criteria: HCPCS codes for encounters where medication reconciliation should occur after an inpatient discharge.),(Exclusion Criteria: n/a)
